General.Name: Blueberries Medical Corp
General.Description: Blueberries Medical Corp. engages in the growth, cultivation, and development of medicinal cannabis and related products in Colombia. It produces psychoactive and non-psychoactive cannabis by-products. Blueberries Medical Corp. is based in Vancouver, Canada.

1.Name: Mr. Ian D. Atacan B.Sc., C.M.A., C.P.A., CMA, CPA, M.B.A., MBA
1.Title: Chief Financial Officer
